strategy: Cadian Shock Troops armies have a Strategy Rating of 2.
Initiative: The Regimental HQ, Kasrkin Companies and Titan Legion formations have an Initiative Rating of 1+. All other formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on a Cadian Shock Troops Regiment

formations.name: 0–1 Regimental HQ
formations.units: One Cadian Supreme Commander with a Commissar, seven Kasrkins. Transported in a Leviathan Mobile Command Center.

formations.name: Whiteshield Company
formations.units: One Cadian Commander with a Commissar, thirteen Whiteshields. Transported in either two Stormlords OR three Crassus Armoured Assault Transports.

sections.name: Support Formations
sections.description: Up to three Support Formations for each Core Company Formation.

formations.name: Medusa Company
formations.units: One Commissar, six Medusa, six Gun Emplacements
upgrades: Add one Hydra and a Gun Emplacement: 50 points

formations.name: Mechanized Infantry Company
formations.units: One Cadian Commander with a Commissar, nine Infantry and five Chimeras

formations.name: Leman Russ Platoon
formations.units: Six Leman Russ, Leman Russ Exterminator or Leman Russ Demolisher

formations.name: Super-Heavy Tank Platoon
formations.units: One Baneblade, Shadowsword, Stormsword or Stormblade

formations.name: Kasrkin Company
formations.units: One Cadian Commander with a Commissar, seven Kasrkins. Transported in either one Storm Lord OR two Crassus Amoured Assault Transports

sections.name: Titan Legion, Imperial Navy
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on Titan Legion and Imperial Navy formations

formations.name: Warhound Pack
upgrades: Warhound Pack gains the 'Independent' special rule: 50 points.

formations.name: 0–1 Orbital Support
upgrades: Replace with an Emperor Class Battleship: 50 points

upgrades.title: Cadian Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

options.description: Replace a Commissar with a Lord Commissar (Regimental HQ only).
Three Leman Russ, Leman Russ Exterminators or Leman Russ Punishers.
One Baneblade, Shadowsword, Stormsword or Stormblade
